sentences.en: A whippoorwill came in and sat on the banister and sung.
sentences.cn: 一只夜鹰飞来,落在栏杆上叫个不停.

sentences.en: He arched over the banister to grab her hand.
sentences.cn: 他拱起身子越过栏杆去抓她的手.

sentences.en: I stepped past the hallway closet and the banister we used to slide down as kids.
sentences.cn: 我迈步向前,走过走廊的橱柜,走过楼梯的扶栏,孩童时候我们常常从扶栏上滑下来取乐.

sentences.en: She grasped hold of the banister to support herself.
sentences.cn: 她抓住楼梯扶手以支撑住自己的身体.

sentences.en: The boys amused themselves by sliding down the banister.
sentences.cn: 男孩们从楼梯扶手滑下以取乐.

trans.tran_en: a row of wooden posts with a bar along the top, that stops you from falling over the edge of stairs
